    RSS: < author > vs: < dc:creator >

    Jun 27, 2010

    I am always willing to admit when I'm wrong. I was just railing on a site for not providing <author> information in their RSS feed. I'm used to pulling the author name using the <author> tag. I come to learn that <author> tag is just meant for the post author's email address. <dc:creator> is truly meant for the name of the author. I didn't know this. I had to Google it and I came up with this post explaining Read more →
